title: Doxa Solutions
text:
Technical Expertise
I specialize in end-to-end AI implementation with deep expertise in:

Machine Learning: Predictive modeling, regression classification, clustering (scikit-learn, XGBoost, PyTorch)

Large Language Models: Fine-tuning, prompt engineering, and deployment (OpenAI, AzureOpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, open-source models)

Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG): Vector databases, chunking strategies, hybrid retrievers

AI Agents: Multi-agent architectures, planning, and tool usage

AI Frameworks: LangChain, LangGraph, LangSmith, LiteLLM and custom orchestration
